getMinValue().Description: Returns minimal value of the Column.

getMaxValue().Description: Returns maximum value of the Column.

getStaticLabels().Description: Returns static labels for each value, minValue maps to labels[0], maxValue maps to labels[labels.length - 1]. When null, @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#picker#PickerColumn#getLabelFormat_E@ will be used.

Parameters: CharSequence: Static labels for each value between minValue and maxValue.
setStaticLabels(java.lang.CharSequence[].Description: Set static labels for each value, minValue maps to labels[0], maxValue maps to labels[labels.length - 1].

Returns: Total items count between minValue and maxValue.
getCount().Description: Get total items count between minValue and maxValue.

Parameters: int: New maximum value to set.
setMaxValue(int).Description: Sets maximum value of the Column.

Parameters: int: Value between minValue and maxValue.
getLabelFor(int).Description: Get a label for value. The label can be static @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#picker#PickerColumn#setStaticLabels_E@ or dynamically generated @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#picker#PickerColumn#setLabelFormat_E@ when static labels is null.

setCurrentValue(int).Description: Sets current value of the Column.

Parameters: String: String format to display label for value between minValue and maxValue.
setLabelFormat(java.lang.String).Description: Set string format (see @B_java#lang#String#format_E@) to display label for an integer value. @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#picker#PickerColumn#setStaticLabels_E@ overrides the format.

Returns: String format to display label for value.
getLabelFormat().Description: Return string format (see @B_java#lang#String#format_E@) to display label for value.

Parameters: int: New minimal value to set.
setMinValue(int).Description: Sets minimal value of the Column.

getCurrentValue().Description: Returns current value of the Column.

ClassDesc: Picker column class used by @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#picker#Picker_E@, defines a contiguous value ranges and associated labels. A PickerColumn has a minValue and maxValue to choose between. The Picker column has a current value. The labels can be dynamically generated from value by @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#picker#PickerColumn#setLabelFormat_E@ or a list of static labels set by @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#picker#PickerColumn#setStaticLabels_E@.
